widgets.label: auto

widgets.onValue:
var range = get('this')
var dbRange = get('variable_dBRange')
// map to dB: [0..1] -> [-60 .. 0]
var inputStart = 0
var inputEnd = 1
var outputStart = dbRange[0]
var outputEnd = dbRange[1]
range = range.sort()
range[0] = (range[0] - inputStart) / (inputEnd - inputStart) * (outputEnd - outputStart) + outputStart
range[1] = (range[1] - inputStart) / (inputEnd - inputStart) * (outputEnd - outputStart) + outputStart
set('loudnessLower', range[0])
set('loudnessUpper', range[1])
set('fadeLowPassFrequency', get('this'))
set('inputFadeLowPassFrequency', get('this'))
set('fadeDuration', get('this'))
set('fadeTimeInput', get('this'))
